ontocomAgent.communication
Class Communication

java.lang.Object
  ontocomAgent.communication.Communication

public class Communication
extends java.lang.Object

Class responsible in use and manipulate the message content of the agents. These messages may be being received on a normal string or registered in text files.

Method Detail

getMessageType

getContent

public java.lang.String[] getContent(java.lang.String agentMessage)
Function to return a small array with the words of the message content of the agents. It depends on the type of communication:
  • 0 - Simple string with message from agent.
  • 1 - The message of agent is from a txt file and in a KQML format (tested only with Prolog content).

Parameters:
agentMessage -
Returns:
String[] with the array of words of message content

getLanguageMsg

public java.lang.String getLanguageMsg(java.lang.String agentMessage)
Returns a string in which language is represented the content of the message agent.

Parameters:
agentMessage - the agent message

setToFileKQML

public void setToFileKQML(java.lang.String archive,
                          java.lang.String agentMessage)
Sets the new message to the KQML file, manipulated from Mediator.

Parameters:
archive - the path to the file
agentMessage - the new agent message
